title: What is the Mesmerist Hypnologist Approach to Lifestyle Change?
first_phrase: This text discusses important changes in the field of hypnosis, where most schools focus on conscious mind and verbal techniques, but the approach of dr. PARET's school is different, working deeply with nonverbal cues to address the whole person. The author states that an effective hypnosis approach goes beyond verbal techniques, and instead works on changing habits, allowing clients to make suitable choices for themselves and those around them. The last 200 tokens introduce the concept of an "Ipnologo Mesmerista," a master of habit change through nonverbal expertise. The certification program for an Ipnologo Mesmerista teaches techniques that allow for fast and effective hypnosis, helping clients achieve lasting results. The text ends by encouraging readers to imagine their lives as successful hypnologists and Mesmerists.
